> Yes I did, I still need to finish the textures but they are basically done

Sweet. No need to go nuts with the textures. Just add a bunch of colors and bake an AO map and call it a day. You can go back a re-do the textures at a later point. It's not like anyone spends a lot of time looking at the textures before they launch, so they are not all that important.

hi. I am using Real <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> with <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>/<abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr>, and I love this mods to bits.

The launch-pads are working fine.

I do not however have the option to pick the Space Shuttle landing runway, or any other runway.

I got a little bit confused by the special <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> instructions (new savegame with only KK, etc.) - which I didn't do. Is that the reason why? 

Thanks for any help!
I have the same problem in regards to missing runways. I did, however, followed the instructions in blue, but that didn't help this particular issue. Any solution to this problem?

I have SLC-40 complete, its just not in the game.

[@Tristonwilson12](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/136353-tristonwilson12/) do I understand correctly that right now RealKSC uses a mesh terrain item? Or do you have a mapdecal? If your terrain is from a mesh, I highly recommend replacing the mapdecal's blank heightmap with an actual Canaveral heightmap to let PQS handle all the terrain natively. MapDecal is notionally for having local heightmaps that override the global heightmap, but all it's used for on Earth right now (and Kerbin one presumes) is to flatten things.
